scripts.generate:models: echo generate models and API interface
scripts.rabbitmq:install: helm install rabbitmq-operator charts/rabbitmq-operator -n critik8s --create-namespace && helm install rabbitmq-cluster charts/rabbitmq-cluster --values settings.yaml -n critik8s
scripts.rabbitmq:uninstall: helm uninstall rabbitmq-cluster -n critik8s && helm uninstall rabbitmq-operator -n critik8s
scripts.emit:install: helm install emit charts/emit -n critik8s --values settings.yaml
